verses.verse: We are <S%G3784>bound<s%> to <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G514>appropriate<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> grows <S%G5232>exceedingly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> each <S%G240>other<s%> <S%G4121>abounds<s%>;

Which is a manifest <S%G1730>token<s%> of the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> may be counted <S%G2661>worthy<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3958>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%>:
<S%G1512>Seeing<s%> it is a righteous <S%G1342>thing<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G467>recompense<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> to them that <S%G2346>trouble<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> who are <S%G2346>troubled<s%> <S%G425>rest<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G1722>when<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> shall be <S%G602>revealed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>mighty<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>,

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G5395>flaming<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1325>taking<s%> <S%G1557>vengeance<s%> on them that <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

<S%G3748>Who<s%> shall be <S%G5099>punished<s%> with <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2479>power<s%>;

<S%G3752>When<s%> he shall <S%G2064>come<s%> to be <S%G1740>glorified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G2296>admired<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>(because<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> was <S%G4100>believed<s%>) <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

<S%G1519>Therefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> would <S%G515>count<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G515>worthy<s%> <S%G2821>of<s%> this <S%G2821>calling<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4137>fulfill<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the good <S%G2107>pleasure<s%> <S%G19>of<s%> his <S%G19>goodness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>:

<S%G3704>That<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may be <S%G1740>glorified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
